Articles.Content:
I mean, anyone remember of the ideas of using the main shuttle fuel tanks left in LKO to make space stations? We'll should be easy enough to do. The graphics shouldn't have to change at all. Also, the only part needed would be a re-purposing module, like five tons, it could even use the hitchhiker container at first.

Just saying, I have been thinking of something like this for a while, hope I somebody can do it.
Take a look at MOLE, it has modules to re-purpose it's tanks.  (The module is shared by many WildBlueIndustries mods, but MOLE probably has the best tanks pre-built.)
